meanings.definition: A group of synthetic chemicals used as insecticides.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use lindanes to protect their crops from bugs.
meanings.sent2: The lindanes sprayed on the plants kept the pests away.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ants threw a party in the lindanes container.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like lindanes, repelling any doubts.
meanings.sent5: The smell of lindanes lingered in the air, a reminder of pest control.

meanings.definition: A specific chemical compound within the lindane group.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the effects of lindanes on the environment.
meanings.sent2: The lab results showed traces of lindanes in the water sample.
meanings.sent3: The lindanes compound in the experiment glowed under UV light.
meanings.sent4: His words had the sharpness of lindanes, cutting through the confusion.
meanings.sent5: The lindanes compound reacted violently with the other chemicals.
